cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 23rd Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 23rd Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic 10 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our 10 bed mixed dorm is your no-fuss, budget-friendly spot to rest after a day of beach and city adventures. Each bunk comes with a comfy mattress, cozy doona, personal reading light, and a charging point to keep your devices powered.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

dorms.name: Standard 12 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Big crew, big energy. Our 12-bed mixed dorm is perfect for social travellers looking to soak up the beachside buzz. Located on the second floor, these dorms come with epic views of Coogee Beachï¿½wake up to sea breezes and surf sounds every morning.

dorms.name: Superior 10 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our fully renovated 10 bed mixed dorm is light, airy, and perfect for travellers who love to mix and mingle. Each bunk is kitted out with a comfy mattress, cozy doona, privacy curtain, double power point, and personal reading light.

dorms.name: Superior 8 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our 8 bed female only dorm is a calm little corner on the third floorï¿½close enough to the action (kitchen, common area, reception) but tucked away just enough for a peaceful nightï¿½s sleep.

dorms.name: Superior 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: This 6-bed mixed dorm is part of a shared apartment-style spaceï¿½perfect for travellers who want room to relax and connect. Youï¿½ll share a comfy living area and and bathroom with just one other 4-bed dorm and a private micro-room,12 guests total.

dorms.labelDescription: This 4-bed mixed dorm on the third floor features two single bunk beds (four comfy singles total), each equipped with a pillow-top mattress, cozy bedding, personal reading light, charging point, and privacy curtains to create your own personal nook.

privates.name: Standard 4 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Ideal for groups or friends travelling together, this private room features two single bunk beds each fitted with a pillow-top mattress, cozy bedding, personal reading light, charging point, and privacy curtains.
